name: 모 아니면 도
text:
쉬움 / 보통
[skull]: 당신이 가진 단서마다 -1.
[cultist]: -2(당신이 자원을 10개 이상 가지고 있다면, -2 대신 -4).
[tablet]: -2. 실패하면, 자원을 3개 잃습니다.
[elder_thing]: -3. 실패하면, ‘스키즈 오’툴’은 공포를 1 받습니다.
back_text:
어려움 / 전문가
[skull]: 당신이 가진 단서마다 -2.
[cultist]: -4(당신이 자원을 10개 이상 가지고 있다면, -4 대신 -8).

flavor: The Clover Club is filled with mobsters and gamblers from all walks of life. Winning big without causing alarm may not be as easy as you thought.
name: 감시의 눈길
text: [action] If you are in the Clover Club Cardroom, spend any number of clues: You cash in your chips. Gain 5 resources for each clue just spent. Forced - If "Skids" O'Toole is defeated: (→R2)
back_flavor: It's getting late, and you've been gambling all night. Exhausted, you try to stand up, but stumble and spill your drink all over a scruffy-looking fellow at your table. Slowly turning to you with a wicked scowl, the husky hoodlum stares at you with contempt. The man leaps out of his seat and lunges at you. Now you've done it. The mobsters are sure to kick you out...
back_text: Each investigator who has not resigned is defeated and suffers 1 physical trauma. If "Skids" O'Toole has resigned, proceed to (→R1). Otherwise, proceed to (→R2)

flavor: You don't want trouble, so it's best not to cause it. Try not to go all in too soon, or you'll likely take the bounce.
name: 카드 게임
text: Investigators cannot resign. Clover Club Pit Boss gains aloof. Forced - After a [[Criminal]] enemy is defeated: Place 1 doom on the agenda. Objective - At the end of the round: If an investigator has 15 or more resources, advance.
back_flavor:
Fueled by luck and adrenaline, you've wont a bit too much and failed to keep a low profile. The O'Bannions know you're here and despise having their money stolen by "cheaters." A commanding voice from La Bella Luna calls out, "That O'Toole vermin is here. Split up and get him!"
You freeze and your mind clears at the sound of your name. It may be time to stop. Once-oblivious mobsters now rise and pursue you with fierce determination. Do you confront the trouble before escaping out the front, or do you try to find the back door?
back_text: Spawn the set-aside Siobhan Riley enemy in La Bella Luna. Each investigator spawns 1 set-aside Clover Club Bouncer enemy engaged with them.

name: 맹렬한 추격
text: Each [[Criminal]] enemy gains hunter and gets +1 health. Forced - When an investigator resigns: Place each of that investigator's resources on this act. Objective - Collect as many resources as you can and get out. When each undefeated investigator has resigned, advance.
back_flavor: You run out the door and sprint around the corner, winnings in hand. The adrenaline rush is like no other. Once at a safe distance, you count your money. You take a deep breath and are relieved; this outing put a big dent in your debts. Surely this night will only add to your reputation. Lady Luck is always on your side!

name: 쇼번 라일리
text: Forced - After Siobhan Riley engages you: For every 5 resources you have, lose 1 resource. Forced - After an investigator at Siobhan Riley's location gains 1 or more resources during the investigation phase: Siobhan Riley readies, engages that investigator, and makes an attack.

name: 클로버 클럽 문지기
text: When Clover Club Bouncer is engaged with you, it gets +1 fight and +1 evade for every 5 resources you have. [action] Spend 3 resources: Parley. Test [intellect] (2). If you succeed, disengage from Clover Club Bouncer and exhaust it. It does not ready during the next upkeep phase.
